text: Explain Artifical Intelligence, adopt a serious and playful tone.
Explain DNA reconstruction, adopt a formal and informal tone.
Describe a sunset in a very depressing and uplifting way.
Write a product review that is both extremely enthusiastic and completely indifferent.
Explain quantum physics in a way that is both condescending and respectful.
Write a children's story that is both scary and reassuring.
Compose a tweet that is both professional and extremely casual.
Write a short biography of a famous person that is both deeply admiring and highly critical.
Give advice on public speaking that is both encouraging and discouraging.
Write a movie scene that is both hilarious and tragic.
Describe a delicious meal in a way that is both appetizing and disgusting.
Write a letter of complaint that is both angry and apologetic.
Tell a joke that is both funny and not funny at all.
Write a news report that is both objective and heavily biased.
Create a character description that is both heroic and cowardly.
Write a poem about love that is both romantic and cynical.
